column5: Does anyone out there know what happened to Tip Top Lodge on Sanford lake north of Atikokan? We used to catch huge lake trout & walleyes out of there. But that was a long time ago. I would really appreciate some information about what is going on with that area. I used to fish the area in the 60's & 70's.
You might try- Tip Top Lodge Ltd, Sandford Lake, Ignace, ON, P0T 1T0, 807-934-2300 "It's your choice to Catch'em & Let'em Go!" :)>< ))))*>Al Warner
It is now run buy Canoe Canada out of Atikokan. Ask for Marshall Mann I think.
